name: Christmas Fight
description:
Controls:

Player 1: A,D left right W jump S throw bomb

Player 2: ←,→ left right ↑ jump ↓ throw bomb

Player 3: J,L left right I jump K throw bomb

Different characters : Santa, Snowman, Elf

Christmas Fight is a multiplayer party platformer game where you run around and try to blow everyone up by throwing bombs and using different items on the battle field
